actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for equal access to COBRA continuation coverage.
short_title: Equal Access to COBRA Act of 2010

summary.text: Equal Access to COBRA Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA), and the Public Health Service Act to extend COBRA coverage (health insurance continuation benefits) to qualified beneficiaries, defined to include domestic partners.

titles.title: Equal Access to COBRA Act of 2010
A bill to provide for equal access to COBRA continuation coverage.
